description: Details of tree protection measures in pursuance of condition 5 of planning permission for deemed consent Ref: P/2011/2692 dated 18 August 2011 for the erection of part single storey, first floor and two storey extension to building KS2 at South West end providing 5 classrooms, toilets and plant in conjunction with the expansion of the school from three to four form entry, lobby and store extension on West side of hall, erection of refuse stores gates and fencing and provision of landscaping, with the widening of the vehicular access off Wyndham Road, erection of substation and switch room by Coombe Road access and provision of gate for relocated pedestrian access at Coombe Road, provision of 16 cycle and 16 scootes parking spaces, removal of temporary classrooms and reinstatement of playing field - TO VIEW DOCUMENTS ONLINE PLEASE SEE PP/2012/0379
